DOC.brief_summary: A randomized study to evaluate the safety and effects of transanal submucosal polyacrylamide hydrogel injection therapy for anal incontinence.
DOC.brief_title: Polyacrylamide Hydrogel Injection Treatment for Anal Incontinence
DOC.detailed_description: A prospective randomized study to assess the use of Bulkamid for anal incontinence using three different transanal injection techniques . Patients with anal incontinence severity Wexner score >7. Standardised injection treatment at baseline. Clinical status and subjective symptom evaluation (Wexner score and FIQL) at baseline, 2 months, 6 months and 1 year.
DOC.criteria: informed consent, anal incontinence with Wexner score >10 ino additional pregnancies, schedule for pelvic organ surgery within 1 year of treatment, current or previous pelvic organ cancer, insulin treated diabetes, inflammatory bowel disease
